import librosa
from pathlib import Path
import IPython.display as ipd

ROOT = Path("..")
TRAIN_AUDIO_ROOT = Path("../input/rfcx-species-audio-detection/train")

SR = 48000
name = "0ab6aa734.flac"
print(name)
source.5432516a:
clip, _ = librosa.load(TRAIN_AUDIO_ROOT / name,
                       sr=SR,
                       mono=True,
                       res_type="kaiser_fast")
ipd.display(ipd.Audio(clip, rate=SR))
